content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It's great that you're taking proactive steps to ensure a comfortable and efficient ride. Remember to communicate openly with the fitter at RIDE Cyclery about your goals, concerns, and any discomfort you've experienced during your training rides. They'll work with you to find the perfect fit for your triathlon bike.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance. You've got this! You're one step closer to crushing your triathlon goals.

Stay focused, stay committed, and most importantly, stay comfortable on your bike!
